resources.string:
1. Move Forward @number@ - the car will move forwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters
2. Move backwards @number@ - the car will move backwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters
3. Rotate clockwise - the car will rotate 15 degrees clockwise
4. Rotate counterclockwise - the car will rotate 15 degrees counter clockwise
Say <<Move Forward @number>> - the car will move forwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters
Say <<Move backwards @number>> - the car will move backwards for a distance equal to @number@ in centimeters
Say <<Rotate clockwise>> - the car will rotate 15 degrees clockwise
Say <<Rotate counterclockwise>> - the car will rotate 15 degrees counter clockwise
